testimonials.subtitle: What our farmers and customers say about us

customer1.name: Sita Sharma
customer1.review: Fresh vegetables delivered right to my door! The quality is amazing and prices are very reasonable. Highly recommended!

farmer1.name: Ram Bahadur
farmer1.review: Since joining this platform, I can sell directly to customers. No middleman, better prices, and steady income!

customer2.name: Anita Poudel
customer2.review: Love supporting local farmers! The app is easy to use and delivery is always on time. Great service!

news.title: Latest News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about farming tips, market trends, and agricultural innovations

winterFarming.title: Winter Farming: Best Practices for Cold Season Crops
winterFarming.description: Discover the most effective techniques for growing vegetables during winter months. Learn about soil preparation, crop selection, and protection methods that can help farmers maximize their yield even in challenging weather conditions.

marketPrices.title: Market Prices: Vegetable Rates This Week
marketPrices.description: Weekly update on current market prices for major vegetables and seasonal produce.

organicFarming.title: Organic Farming: Getting Started Guide
organicFarming.description: Complete beginner's guide to transitioning from conventional to organic farming methods.

agriTech.title: New Agricultural Technology Trends
agriTech.description: Explore the latest farming technologies that are revolutionizing agriculture.

waterConservation.title: Water Conservation in Farming
waterConservation.description: Effective irrigation techniques to save water and improve crop yield.

pestControl.title: Pest Control: Natural Methods
pestControl.description: Chemical-free approaches to protect your crops from common pests.

cropPlanning.title: Seasonal Crop Planning Guide
cropPlanning.description: Plan your crops according to seasons for maximum profitability.
